name: Frey
subtitle: Priestess of Light
description: A childhood friend of Kasel's, she is a priestess who serves the Goddess. She heals and protects allies with the power of light. With the blessings of the Goddess, she can temporarily increase one's magic powers and resistance.
story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

inn.idle: Goddess Lua, whom within the Light resides - let our faith never waver.

recruit.greet: May Lua's blessing be with you.
talk: My relationship with Kasel? Haha, we're like family. I guess I'm like his guardian?
I wonder how High Priestess Iris is doing. I haven't seen her ever since I left...
Haha, don't Roi and Cleo make a nice couple?

affinity.greet: There you are. You didn't get hurt, did you?
talk: I see a bright light in my dreams sometimes. People with white wings with a brilliant sun behind them...
Who I like? Th-that's a secret between me and Lua.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I won't forget your thoughtfulness.

relationship.greet: I sincerely pray that Lua watches over you.
talk: Kasel's safety is important. He was chosen by the Goddess, after all.
All decisions can be met with disdain. I do not mind, as long as the Goddess is happy with it.
The relationship between God and priests is not so different from a relationship between simple people. Sometimes...we disagree.

uw.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
description: Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 80% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 20% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 96% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 24% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 115% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 29% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 138% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 35% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 165% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 42% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 200% of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by 50% for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
uw.story: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. When a high ranking angel dies, the remaining core is transferred to the haven of angels for resurrection. However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.

s1.name: Miraculous Light
s1.description: Heals {0} HP of an ally with the lowest HP.

books.2: Removes negative effects from the target.

s1.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, the skill targets 2 allies.
s1.dark: Healed allies take 25% reduced M.DMG for 10 sec.

ut.name: Angel's Egg
description: [Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 1 sec.
[Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 1.2 sec.
[Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 1.4 sec.
[Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 1.7 sec.
[Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 2.1 sec.
[Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 2.5 sec.
ut.story: The treasure that Frey loves dearly. It is a crystal orb that Frey had when she was found as an infant under the World Tree. Frey named it Angel's Egg for its luster like angel's hair, and she's cherished it her entire life.

s2.name: Blessings of Light
s2.description: Cast a shield on all allies that absorbs {1} DMG for {0} sec. While the shield is in effect, gain Immunity to CC.

books.2: Target's Heal rate is increased by {0}% for the duration of skill.

ut.name: Miraculous Medal
description: [Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 100 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 120 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 140 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 170 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 210 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 250 Mana every second for 4 sec.
ut.story: Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

s3.name: Heaven's Vengeance
s3.description: Attacks the target and its nearby enemies 6 times, dealing up to {0} M.DMG. Hit targets will be blinded for {1} sec, and take {2}% increased DMG.
s3.light: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, DMG is increased by 80%.
s3.dark: Blind duration is reduced by 2 sec and now targets a random enemy.

ut.name: Forgotten Arbiter's Feather
description: [Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1.5 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 2 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 2.5 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 3 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 3.5 sec.
ut.story: Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

s4.name: Goddess Grace
s4.description: Increases M.DEF of 1 ally with the lowest HP by {1} for {0} sec every 15 sec.

books.2: Heals target's HP by {0}% for the duration of skill.

s4.light: Target's ATK Spd. is boosted by 250.

ut.name: Angelic Advent
description: [Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 20% for the duration of skill.
[Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 24% for the duration of skill.
[Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 29% for the duration of skill.
[Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 35% for the duration of skill.
[Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 42% for the duration of skill.
[Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 50% for the duration of skill.
ut.story: An old storybook owned by Frey. It was the first storybook ever given to young Frey as a present, and it tells of a war between the Angels and Demons. Frey particularly likes the part where the Angels emerge victorious after defeating all the Demons.

t5.dark: Increases ATK of all allies by 5% of own ATK.
